title: Isinda (Pisidian)
description: An ancient settlement of Pisidia, located at modern Korkuteli in Turkey's Antalya province. The acropolis hill was heavily damaged by the construction of the modern dam in the 20th century. The majority of the ancient settlement probably lay to the east of the acropolis and is now covered by the neighborhood of Alaaddin (Alaeddin Mahalessi).

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth with reference to description and photographs in French 1994 (page 54 and plates 4.4.1 and 4.4.2).
properties.title: Imagery Location: Remains of Isinda "acropolis hill"
